text: Wone mibatilile malajizo ga Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa hemwe, jila jondilinguwapani lehano, momgana Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa hemwe na kuwinza nzila za heye, na kibatilila malajizo na mizilo ja heye, lelo mochikala na konjezeka, na heye Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa hemwe, kowatambichiza kuli isi yomlinguluta kuihola.
